OrgName.entry: FRIENDS OF CROOKES QUARRY KITCHEN GARDENS

Desc.entry: An informal allotment society for plot holders of allotments at Crookes Quarry, a small allotment site adjacent to Crookes cemetery. Holds a volunteer day once a week to give non-plot holders the opportunity to come and garden. The group has been running for 5 years and encourages a friendly community feel for the allotment.

Pubs.entry: Leaflet - detailing allotments history and plot lay-out

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Friday, weekly voulunteer day, please contact for details
